channel.title: Tau cannon gone
channel.description: After i picked up the tau cannon, I saved then once i got to the dam, it was gone ande i could not pick up ammo. Could this be patched by making the ammo the same as the gun when you pick it up? plz help :frowning: > :frowning: :'(:fffuuu:

item.title: Tau cannon gone
item.dc:creator: Cpl.1nsane
item.description:
Per chance did you back track to the Questionable Ethics exterior map then back to the beginning of Surface Tension again?

Read full topic

item.title: Tau cannon gone
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Try using the console to spawn it again?

  • Enable the console
  • Type in “sv_cheats 1” and smash enter
  • Then “give weapon_tau”

And you should have your gun.

Read full topic
